chapter.title: Managing Record Attributes
chapter.para: You can specify any attribute via the URI or CMDB class instance. If neither exists, the value is determined from the CloudForms VM or miq_provision objects.
The attributes can be reduced or extended as required by amending the Ruby methods.

note.para: Some attributes are not free-text (variable) fields, that is, they must be specific values. For example, Vendor value must already exist in the ServiceNow Vendor table beforehand.
